name: AUSTRALIAN AIRLINE PILOT ACADEMY PTY LTD
about: Australian Airline Pilot Academy Pty Ltd is a premier aviation training institution dedicated to providing high-quality educational courses and services in the aviation industry. Approved by the Australian Civil Aviation Safety Authority (CASA), the academy offers a range of programs including private pilot licences, commercial pilot training, and other specialized aviation courses. With a focus on practical training, the academy benefits from an unrestricted training area up to 10,000 feet, allowing for flexible and comprehensive flight instruction. The academy is committed to equipping students with the skills and knowledge necessary to succeed in their aviation careers. By choosing Australian Airline Pilot Academy, aspiring pilots can ensure they receive internationally recognized training that prepares them for a successful future in aviation.
